example.parse: (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS راح) (NP-SBJ-2 (-NONE- *)) (PP (PREP ب) (NP (PRON_3MS ه))) (S-ADV (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يجلد) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *-2)) (NP-OBJ (IVSUFF_DO:3MP هم)) (PP (PREP على) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN اقفيت) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MP هم)))) (S-ADV (VP (PSEUDO_VERB عل) (NP-SBJ-4 (PRON_3MP هم)) (S (S (VP (IV3MP+IV+IVSUFF_SUBJ:MP_MOOD:I يفقهون) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *-4)))) (CONJ ف) (S (VP (IV3MP+IV+IVSUFF_SUBJ:MP_MOOD:I يستدركون) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *-4))))))))))) (PUNC .))
